Nothing feels quite as luxurious as sipping from beautiful glassware in the morning. The good news is you don’t have to spend a lot to upgrade your collection. A trip to Dollar Tree will reveal a variety of stunning finds, including one Irish-style cup that shoppers can’t stop raving about.

The glass Irish Coffee Mugs at Dollar Tree are designed with an elegant foot and a beautifully looped handle. They cost $1.25, and you can snag them in stores or on the discount retailer’s website. One cup can hold up to 8 ounces of liquid. 

Once you grab these beautiful mugs from Dollar Tree, you can make a delicious Irish Coffee by mixing a cup of joe with Irish whiskey, dark brown sugar, and a topping of whipped cream and shaved chocolate. But they’re not just good for boozy coffee! They’re perfect for spicy chai, honey chamomile, or cozy cinnamon lattes or good ol’ hot chocolate. 

If you look through the reviews of these Irish Coffee Mugs on Dollar Tree’s website, you’ll see that most shoppers are really happy with their purchase. One person wrote, “Quality glassware that’s stylish! Love these! Highly recommended!” Another shopper said, “These are exactly what I wanted, and I can’t wait to use them on St. Patrick’s Day.”

Some people on social media have even turned the Irish Coffee Mugs into Butterbeer glasses to get into the Harry Potter spirit.

Dollar Tree has a great selection of beautiful glassware. On the discount retailer’s website, you’ll find clear 18-ounce chubby mugs perfect for whisking matcha. There are also cute Mason jar-shaped cups with handles, ideal for enjoying a refreshing iced tea or a cold beer.

If you’re looking to update your glassware, take a few minutes to browse Dollar Tree’s website. For just $1.25, you can stock your cabinets with beautiful, timeless pieces. If you’re eyeing those Irish coffee mugs, be sure to grab them soon — with St. Patrick’s Day approaching, they’re likely to sell out quickly, both online and in stores.

Buy: Clear Glass Irish Coffee Mugs, $1.25
